question: As of December 2020, which state is permitted to receive the highest market borrowings, for its performance in ULB reforms?
explanation:
The Finance Ministry has linked a part of additional borrowing permission granted to the States to completion of reforms.
One of the four reforms is the Urban Local body/ utility reforms. Recently, the Ministry announced that Andhra Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh completed the set of reforms in functioning of ULBs, with Andhra Pradesh getting permission to mobilise highest financial resources of Rs.2,525 crore.
